about_the_game:
Premium Edition content includes:
  • Original Soundtrack (41 tracks)
  • 8 audio books (160 minutes total running time)
  • A wonderful game comic by artist Olga Andriyenko
detailed_description:
Premium Edition content includes:
  • Original Soundtrack (41 tracks)
  • 8 audio books (160 minutes total running time)
  • A wonderful game comic by artist Olga Andriyenko

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (10.7)
  • Processor: 2 GHz (Dual Core) Intel
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

name: The Night of the Rabbit Premium Edition Upgrade

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: The Night of the Rabbit Premium Edition Upgrade - $4.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy The Night of the Rabbit Premium Edition Upgrade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz (Single Core) or 2 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 256 MB RAM (Shared Memory is not recommended)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz (Single Core) or 2 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 512 MB RAM (Shared Memory is not recommended)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Lose yourself in a tale of magic and wonder, where anything is possible and where nothing is quite as it seems: join young Jerry and follow a peculiar white rabbit to the wondrous realm of Mousewood, a land where critters can speak and where mystery abounds.
supported_languages:
English*, German*, French, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Polish, Czech, Portuguese - Brazil, Italian
*languages with full audio support
